channel.title: Movie Crush
channel.itunes:subtitle: Movie Crush
channel.description: Chuck Bryant of Stuff You Should Know sits down with your favorite people to talk about their favorite movies. Simple enough, but what we get is much more than that. It’s a look at what makes a favorite thing, and why someone’s favorite movie says so much about who they are. More conversation than interview, Movie Crush, at its heart, is about the love affair we all have with the silver screen.

item.title: Chuck Bryant On The Why I’m Voting Podcast
item.itunes:title: Chuck Bryant On The Why I’m Voting Podcast
item.description:
Hey, Movie Crush fans! We wanted to make sure you caught Chuck on the Why I’m Voting podcast. Check it out and don’t forget to vote on November 3rd! 

If you want to change, preserve, or build a better America, there’s one easy way to make your voice heard: Vote. This year, iHeartRadio is teaming up with over 20 incredible celebrities (plus a handful of our most popular podcasters) to get the country excited to go vote, broadcasting the personal, emotional and heartfelt stories behind why showing up to the ballot box means so much-- not just as individuals, but for our entire nation.

Thank you to our partners AXE, Knorr® & Seventh Generation

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.itunes:title: Movie Crush Special: Joe Berlinger on Documentary Filmmaking
item.description:
Hey, friends! I had a great conversation with legendary documentary filmmaker Joe Berlinger. We had intended to zero in on his crush pick, the 1969 vérité classic, Salesman. But this was a press tour and time was short, so we ended up just having a great overall chat about documentaries and also his new scripted Netflix film, Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.description:
You've all been asking for film crew members on the show, so this week Chuck asked his friend Raymond Carr to join him in the studio. Raymond is a very talented production designer and art director for TV and film, but his real talents are in the world of puppetry, where he most recently fulfilled a lifelong dream working for The Henson Company. It should be no surprise that Ray's movie crush is the 1986 fantasy adventure film, Labyrinth. Listen in and learn about the fascinating world of puppetry!

item.title: Trailer
item.itunes:title: Trailer
item.description:
Movie Crush is an interview show where Chuck Bryant from Stuff You Should Know sits down with your favorite people to talk about their favorite movie. Simple enough, but what we get is much more than that. It’s a look at what makes a favorite thing, and why someone’s favorite movie says so much about who they are. More conversation than interview, Movie Crush, at its heart, is about the love affair we all have with the silver screen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Movie Crush is an interview show where Chuck Bryant from Stuff You Should Know sits down with your favorite people to talk about their favorite movie. Simple enough, but what we get is much more than that. It’s a look at what makes a favorite thing, and why someone’s favorite movie says so much about who they are. More conversation than interview, Movie Crush, at its heart, is about the love affair we all have with the silver screen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
